metadata.name: PowerView PowerShell Cmdlets - ScriptBlock
metadata.comment: Detects Cmdlet names from PowerView of the PowerSploit exploitation framework.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('export-powerviewcsv')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('find-domainlocalgroupmember')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('find-domainobjectpropertyoutlier')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('find-domainprocess')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('find-domainshare')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('find-domainuserevent')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('find-domainuserlocation')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('find-foreigngroup')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('find-foreignuser')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('find-gpocomputeradmin')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('find-gpolocation')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('find-interestingdomain')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('find-interestingfile')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('find-localadminaccess')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('find-managedsecuritygroups')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-cachedrdpconnection')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-dfsshare')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-domaindfsshare')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-domaindnsrecord')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-domaindnszone')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-domainfileserver')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-domaingpocomputerlocalgroupmapping')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-domaingpolocalgroup')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-domaingpouserlocalgroupmapping')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-lastloggedon')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-loggedonlocal')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-netfileserver')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-netforest')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-netgpogroup')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-netprocess')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-netrdpsession')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-registrymounteddrive')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-regloggedon')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-wmiregcachedrdpconnection')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-wmireglastloggedon')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-wmiregmounteddrive')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-wmiregproxy')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-aclscanner')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-checklocaladminaccess')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-enumeratelocaladmin')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-eventhunter')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-filefinder')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-kerberoast')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-mapdomaintrust')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-processhunter')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-reverttoself')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-sharefinder')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-userhunter')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-userimpersonation')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('remove-remoteconnection')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('request-spnticket')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('resolve-ipaddress'))))

output.summary: Detects Cmdlet names from PowerView of the PowerSploit exploitation framework.
